Yea, once again I'm sending a fresh team through the game. :-)

2 clerics
1 druid
1 archer
1 fire elemental
1 ghost

I've always noticed the hardest point of the game is getting your team
established.  You're always struggling through the 1st 10-15 scenarios
to avoid losses and then finally your team can start to hold its own .
. occasionally.

Do the 1st 10-15 scenarios where you get started with a fresh team
always seem to be the most difficult.  I admit dreading going to "Tic
and Tac" and make it one of my last places to visit.
